trans-unit.source: Setup Reporting for Business Central in Power BI | Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: Setup Reporting for Business Central in Power BI | Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Nastavení generování sestav v Business Central v Power BI | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: You can make your Financials data available as a data source in Power BI and build powerful reports of the state of your business.

seg-source.mrk: You can make your Financials data available as a data source in Power BI and build powerful reports of the state of your business.

target.mrk: Můžete zpřístupnit svá finanční data jakožto zdroj dat v Power BI a vytvářet silné sestavy, vypovídající o stavu vašeho podnikání.

trans-unit.source: Using [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] as Power BI Data Source for Building Reports

seg-source.mrk: Using [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] as Power BI Data Source for Building Reports

target.mrk: Používání [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] jako zdroje dat Power BI pro vytváření sestav.

trans-unit.source: You can make your [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] data available as a data source in Power BI and build powerful reports of the state of your business.

seg-source.mrk: You can make your [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] data available as a data source in Power BI and build powerful reports of the state of your business.

target.mrk: Můžete zpřístupnit svá [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] data jakožto zdroj dat v Power BI a vytvářet silné sestavy o stavu vašeho podnikání.

trans-unit.source: You must have a valid account with [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] and with Power BI.

seg-source.mrk: You must have a valid account with [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] and with Power BI.

target.mrk: Musíte mít platný účet v [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] a ve službě Power BI.

trans-unit.source: Also, you must download [Power BI Desktop](https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/desktop/).

seg-source.mrk: Also, you must download [Power BI Desktop](https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/desktop/).

target.mrk: Také si musíte stáhnout [Power BI Desktop](https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/desktop/).

trans-unit.source: To add [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] as a data source in Power BI Desktop

seg-source.mrk: To add [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] as a data source in Power BI Desktop

target.mrk: Chcete-li přidat [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] jako zdroj dat v Power BI Desktop

trans-unit.source: In Power BI Desktop, in the left navigation pane, choose **Get Data**.

seg-source.mrk: In Power BI Desktop, in the left navigation pane, choose **Get Data**.

target.mrk: V Power BI Desktop, v levém navigačním podokně zvolte **Získat data**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Get Data** window, choose **Online Services**, choose **Dynamics 365 Business Central**, and then choose the **Connect** button.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Get Data** window, choose **Online Services**, choose **Dynamics 365 Business Central**, and then choose the **Connect** button.

target.mrk: V okně **Získat data** zvolte **Online služby**, zvolte **Dynamics 365 Business Central**, a poté zvolte tlačítko **Připojit**.

trans-unit.source: Power BI displays a wizard that will guide you through the [connection process](across-how-to-connect-powerbi-dynamics-365-content-packs-help.md).

seg-source.mrk: Power BI displays a wizard that will guide you through the [connection process](across-how-to-connect-powerbi-dynamics-365-content-packs-help.md).

target.mrk: Power BI zobrazí průvodce, který vás provede skrz [proces připojení](across-how-to-connect-powerbi-dynamics-365-content-packs-help.md).

trans-unit.source: The first step will be to sign into the service.

seg-source.mrk: The first step will be to sign into the service.

target.mrk: Prvním krokem bude přihlášení do služby.

trans-unit.source: Select **Sign in** and choose the account you would like to sign in as.

seg-source.mrk: Select **Sign in** and choose the account you would like to sign in as.

target.mrk: Vyberte možnost **Přihlásit se** a vyberte účet, kterým se chcete přihlásit.

trans-unit.source: This should be the same account you sign into [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] with.

seg-source.mrk: This should be the same account you sign into [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] with.

target.mrk: To by měl být stejný účet, se kterým se přihlašujete do [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Choose the **Connect** button to continue.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the **Connect** button to continue.

target.mrk: Zvolte tlačítko **Připojit** a pokračujte.

trans-unit.source: The Power BI wizard shows a list of [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] companies and data sources.

seg-source.mrk: The Power BI wizard shows a list of [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] companies and data sources.

target.mrk: Průvodce Power BI zobrazuje seznam [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] společností a zdrojů dat.

trans-unit.source: These data source represent all the web services that you have published from each company in [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

seg-source.mrk: These data source represent all the web services that you have published from each company in [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

target.mrk: Tyto zdroje dat představují všechny webové služby, které jste publikovali z každé společnosti v [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, create a new web service URL in [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] by using the **Create Data Set** action in the **Web Services** page, using the **Set Up Reporting** Assisted Setup guide, or by choosing the **Edit in Excel** action in any lists.

seg-source.mrk: Alternatively, create a new web service URL in [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] by using the **Create Data Set** action in the **Web Services** page, using the **Set Up Reporting** Assisted Setup guide, or by choosing the **Edit in Excel** action in any lists.

target.mrk: Případně vytvořte novou adresu URL webové služby v [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] pomocí akce **Vytvořit sadu dat** na stránce **Webové služby**, pomocí Průvodce asistovanou instalací **Nastavení vykazování** nebo výběrem akce **Upravit v Excelu** v libovolném seznamu.

trans-unit.source: Specify the data you want to add to your data model, and then choose the **Load** button.

seg-source.mrk: Specify the data you want to add to your data model, and then choose the **Load** button.

target.mrk: Určete data, která chcete přidat do svého datového modelu, a poté zvolte tlačítko **Načíst**.

trans-unit.source: Repeat the previous steps to add additional [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] data to your Power BI data model.

seg-source.mrk: Repeat the previous steps to add additional [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] data to your Power BI data model.

target.mrk: Chcete-li do datového modelu Power BI přidat další [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] data, opakujte předchozí kroky.

trans-unit.source: Once you have successfully connected to [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], you will not be prompted again to sign in.

seg-source.mrk: Once you have successfully connected to [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], you will not be prompted again to sign in.

target.mrk: Jakmile se úspěšně připojíte k [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], nebudete již vyzýváni k přihlášení.

trans-unit.source: Once the data is loaded it will appear in the right navigation on the page.

seg-source.mrk: Once the data is loaded it will appear in the right navigation on the page.

target.mrk: Jakmile jsou data načtena, objeví se v navigaci vpravo na stránce.

trans-unit.source: At this point, you have successfully connected to your Business Central data and are ready to begin building your Power BI report.

seg-source.mrk: At this point, you have successfully connected to your Business Central data and are ready to begin building your Power BI report.

target.mrk: V tomto okamžiku jste se úspěšně připojili k datům Business Central a jste připraveni začít budovat své sestavy Power BI.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Power BI documentation](https://powerbi.microsoft.com/documentation/powerbi-landing-page/).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see the [Power BI documentation](https://powerbi.microsoft.com/documentation/powerbi-landing-page/).

target.mrk: Pro více informací navštivte sekci [Dokumentace Power BI ](https://powerbi.microsoft.com/documentation/powerbi-landing-page/).
